Articles.Content:
This challenge hasn\'t come up in a while, so I thought i\'d start it off with my attached picture which is 13 mins 8 seconds. The ship has to be within 50 metres of its target to count, mechjeb is allowed, the time launch to rendezvous feature doesn\'t seem to work anyway.

Good luck

Get object in 70X70 orbit

Wait for perfect moment

Launch

???

Profit!

You would launch up, and rendezvous at over 3km/s
